function.name: cookingTimer_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the cooking time for a specific compartment of cooking equipment.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking time is being set.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking time is being set.

cookingTimer.description: The duration to be set as the cooking time.
